name: Rosa Hargana
loreDescription: Gun mage Amber Rose was an expert in lightweight magic and sharpshooting. Her magic bullets never missed, even when aimed at her own lover.

skillDescription.base: Increases Dual Attack Chance by 7.0% and increases Attack by 30% when it's not the caster's turn.
skillDescription.max: Increases Dual Attack Chance by 14.0% and increases Attack by 30% when it's not the caster's turn.
